feed.title: Laboratory of Oral Mucosal Immunity
feed.subtitle: Website for the Laboratory of Oral Mucosal Immunity @ U of MN

entry.title: New Member
entry.content: Our newest member, Kevin Cunningham, has joined the lab. Kevin is a PhD student from the Bioinformatics and Computational Biology program. Welcome to the team!
entry.summary: Our newest member, Kevin Cunningham, has joined the lab. Kevin is a PhD student from the Bioinformatics and Computational Biology program. Welcome to the team!

entry.title: New Member
entry.content: Our inagural member, Shashwata Biswas, has joined the lab. Shashwata is a post-doc who did his PhD in Japan. Welcome aboard!
entry.summary: Our inagural member, Shashwata Biswas, has joined the lab. Shashwata is a post-doc who did his PhD in Japan. Welcome aboard!

entry.title: R00 awarded
entry.content: Our first grant, an R00 titled “T cell response in Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans-associated periodontal disease” was awarded by NIDCR/NIH!
entry.summary: Our first grant, an R00 titled “T cell response in Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans-associated periodontal disease” was awarded by NIDCR/NIH!

entry.title: Laboratory opens
entry.content: The Laboratory of Oral Mucosal Immunity opens its doors in September 2024 - and we’re hiring! Check out the Teams page to see hiring announcements.
entry.summary: The Laboratory of Oral Mucosal Immunity opens its doors in September 2024 - and we’re hiring! Check out the Teams page to see hiring announcements.
